name: iPhone SE (2nd generation)
information: Released in 2020, the iPhone SE combines the design of the iPhone 8 with the powerful A13 Bionic chip.

name: iPhone 11
information: Introduced in 2019, the iPhone 11 features a dual-camera system, A13 Bionic chip, and a Liquid Retina display.

name: iPhone 12 mini
information: Released in 2020, the iPhone 12 mini is a smaller version of the iPhone 12 with a 5.4-inch Super Retina XDR display.

name: iPhone 12
information: Released in 2020, the iPhone 12 features 5G connectivity, a Ceramic Shield front cover, and the A14 Bionic chip.

name: iPhone 12 Pro
information: Positioned as a more advanced model in the iPhone 12 series, the iPhone 12 Pro includes a triple-camera system with LiDAR technology and a stainless steel frame.

name: iPhone 12 Pro Max
information: The largest model in the iPhone 12 series, the Pro Max offers a 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display and the same advanced camera features as the iPhone 12 Pro.

name: iPhone 13 mini
information: Released in 2021, the iPhone 13 mini features a smaller form factor with a 5.4-inch Super Retina XDR display and the A15 Bionic chip.

name: iPhone 13
information: Also released in 2021, the iPhone 13 includes improvements in battery life, camera capabilities, and the A15 Bionic chip.

name: iPhone 13 Pro Max
information: The top-of-the-line model in the iPhone 13 series, the Pro Max features a ProMotion display with a 120Hz refresh rate, advanced camera systems, and the A15 Bionic chip.
